definitions: a person or thing that makes partial or minor changes to something

examples.text: mood modifiers like Valium and Lithium

shortDefinitions: person or thing that makes partial or minor changes

definitions: a word, especially an adjective or noun used attributively, that restricts or adds to the sense of a head noun (e.g. good and family in a good family house).
shortDefinitions: word that restricts sense of head noun

definitions: a gene which modifies the phenotypic expression of a gene at another locus.
shortDefinitions: gene which modifies phenotypic expression of gene at another locus
